title: Make quarkus.x.health.enabled configurable at run time
body:
### Description

There are some debates as to whether the readiness check should include checks on external systems.
We do not intend to do so for the "hundreds" ;-) of quarkus applications we are going to create.
We would like to make this a standard for all of these applications (and configure a standard env variable to disable those DS checks), and not rely on each app to specify `quarkus.datasource.health.enabled`
Unfortunately those properties are build time. We would like it to be run time instead, so that we can set the value using our deployment tool for all apps.

see also this [discussion](https://groups.google.com/g/quarkus-dev/c/pj6L7kzbIno/m/p5LEgE-gAAAJ)

### Implementation ideas

make `quarkus.x.health.enabled` run time

if not feasible, is there a way to set a property at build time from an extension?
